solution_line_template: So, Diane is {denise_current_age} - {diane_age_difference} = <<{denise_current_age}-{diane_age_difference}={diane_current_age}>>{diane_current_age} years old now.
Diane will be {diane_target_age} years old in {diane_target_age} - {diane_current_age} = <<{diane_target_age}-{diane_current_age}={years_until_diane_25}>>{years_until_diane_25} years.
